text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 94.1. Kiya hum nay tera seena nahi khol diya 94.2. Aur tujh per say tera bojh hum ney utar diya 94.3. Jiss nay teri peth tordi thi 94.4. Aur hum nay tera zikar buland kerdiya
